title: [Dead Plateau, Cliff Side]
description: The moon shines down brightly off this weathered basalt rock formation.  The face of the cliff rises a couple hundred feet, ascended by a well-defined switchback.  In the distance below, a small copse of trees nestles near a creek, the trees being the only large area of vegetation in sight.  The rest of the area is rolling scrub hills rising to a small mountain range.  It looks as if someone has scratched something in the cliff side here, but the words have long weathered into illegibility.

The sun shines down brightly and warmly off this weathered basalt rock formation.  The face of the cliff rises a couple hundred feet, ascended by a well-defined switchback.  In the distance below, a small copse of trees nestles near a creek, the trees being the only large area of vegetation in sight.  The rest of the area is rolling scrub hills rising to a small mountain range.  It looks as if someone has scratched something in the cliff side here, but the words have long weathered into illegibility.
